addAll.message: Add all tabs to the Reading List

deleteTitle.message: Do you want to delete this web page from the Reading List?

addedAll.message: Added all tabs to the Reading List

emptyList.message: You can add new items via a toolbar button or a context menu.

spanBugReport.message: You have found a bug, maybe you have an idea how to improve the extension, create a new issue on

spanTranslation1.message: Do you want the extension to be available in your native language, please translate

spanTranslation3.message: and add it in a new issue on

spanShare.message: Do you like this extension? Share it or write a review to reach as many people as possible.

restoreAlertH4.message: Are you sure you want to restore the selected backup?

restoreAlertP.message: This operation can not be undone. All current data will be deleted. If you select the wrong or corrupted file, the extension will not work properly.

restoreError.message: A problem occured. Please try again.

showPageAction.message: Show button in the address bar

readerMode1.message: Open only those pages that certainly can be displayed

readerMode2.message: Open pages except those that certainly can not be displayed

failedReaderTitle.message: Failed to load article from page
failedReaderTitle.description: This string must be copied from https://hg.mozilla.org/l10n-central/<lang-code>/file/tip/toolkit/chrome/global/aboutReader.properties where <lang-code> is eg. fr, zh-CN, pt-BR (aboutReader.loadError)
